channel.title: [HELP] Questions [HELP]
channel.description:
1. When I logout, it takes like 10 second to logout my player. How can I fix this ? I found no 10 second in my server with logout thing.
2. How can I make it so when a player is in Jail, he can't escape with a command who teleports you like ::shop ?
Thanks.

item.title: [HELP] Questions [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

  1. its good for your client to wait 10 seconds.

why is it good to wait 10 seconds?

its good because its checking if your being attacked or if your in wiled etc its good that it checks and takes 10 seconds. it will also help xlogging

  1. add this to the end of all you tele commands
if(command.startsWith("home") && !isInJail()){
triggerTele(3092, 3492, 0);
brightness = 4;
}

if that dont work then take the ! away from the front of isInJail() .

Read full topic
